Based on your preferences for sound and war movies, I would recommend "A Little Princess" to you.

"A Little Princess" is a classic children's book that was first published in 1905 by Frances Hodgson Burnett. The story revolves around the life of Sara Crewe, who becomes the only student at a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.
